title: Drawing, "Costume Design for Red Knight, for Checkmate", 1937
medium: Brush and gouache, graphite on white paper
signed: Signed in black ink, lower right: E. Mcknight Kauffer
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, line pointing at discs, left: Brass discs; right: Brass t[...]; right margin: as long as / practically / possible; in black ink, lower right: Red Knight "Checkmate"
creditline: Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer
description: Costume design in red and orange for knight. Man looks to the right with his arm raised. His helmet in the shape of a horse’s head. Yellow horse hair tassels stream from his helmet and sleeves of his tunic; he also wears tights in orange and red.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Costume Design for Red Knight, for Checkmate", 1937.
1937. Brush and gouache, graphite on white paper. Gift of Mrs. E. McKnight Kauffer. 1963-39-278.
